--------------------
Text: Once is a musical based on the 2007 film of the same name by John Carney.
Triplets:<Once
2:
--------------------
Text: Once (musical):  The book for the musical was written by Enda Walsh.
Triplets:<Once
3:
--------------------
Text: Once (musical):  The musical premiered at the New York Theatre Workshop in 2011, before transferring to Broadway in 2012.
Triplets:<Once
4:
--------------------
Text: Once (musical):  The production received eleven 2012 Tony Award nominations, and won eight including Best Musical, Best Actor and Best Book.
Triplets:<Once
5:
--------------------
Text: Once (musical):  The musical also won the 2012 Drama Desk Award for Outstanding Musical and the 2013 Grammy Award for Best Musical Theater Album.
Triplets:<Once (musical)
6:
--------------------
Text: Once (musical):  It has since spawned a London production, with a North American Tour which started on 1 October 2013.
